mapper.insert: insert into members(id, password, name, nickname, email, gender, height, career, aim_weight, address, period, birth) values(#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{height}, #{career}, #{aim_weight}, #{address}, #{period}, #{birth})
mapper.select: select * from members where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
select weight from myweight where mem_id=#{id} and rownum=1 order by weight_id desc;
